description.value:
Your telepathy grants you an unparalleled strength of mind.

Prerequisites: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#telepathy]{Telepathy} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.QmSOsPFazgFH1kKu]{limited telepathy} species trait

Benefit: The DC to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i#demoralize]{demoralize} you with @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i]{Intimidation} increases by 2. In addition, once per day, you can reroll a failed saving throw against a fear effect.

Teamwork Benefit: If youâ€™re within 20 feet of an ally you can see who also has this feat, the DC to demoralize you with Intimidate increases by 4 instead of 2. Also, you can spend 1 Resolve Point as a swift action to reduce the duration of your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{Shaken}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.BVdjvpucmvQU4cc1]{Panicked} condition by [[/r 1d4]]{1d4 rounds} (possibly ending the condition altogether).
